name: Bird VS Alien
description:
A game for Zero Words vol.2 game jam.

The aliens have kidnapped the eagle egg. but this alien is messing again the wrong eagle, help this eagle rescue her egg from the alien using her laser eye attack, wind blast, and the mighty poop bomb!!

but be fast because after a long period of time she will slowly lose her ability one by one. let show this alien who they're messing with!!

Controls:

Shot : Z

Select: X

Move : Arrow Key
